H0.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1521

H1.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1534

H2.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1540

H3.text: Give a year in the life of St Ignatius Loyola, founder of the Jesuits.. 1491-1556

A4.text: born Íñigo López de Oñaz y Loyola; c. 23 October 1491 – 31 July 1556.

A5.text: On the morning of the 15th of August, 1534, in the chapel of the Martyrium of Saint Denis, in Montmartre, Loyola and his six companions, of whom only one was a priest, met and took upon themselves the solemn vows of their lifelong work.

A6.text: Ignatius founded the Society of Jesus in Paris in 1541.

A7.text: Ignatius gained a Magisterium from the University of Paris at the age of forty-three in 1535.
